project.title: Covid-19 Live Tracker
project.tagline: Covid-19 live tracker website for Sevima Hackathon 2021
project.about: Covid-19 live tracker website for Sevima Hackathon 2021 [3rd Place].
features: Responsive built with Bootstrap 5 and jQuery
Live tracker of confirmed cases, recovered cases, and deaths
project.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.
